statement.tex:
\text{A manufacturer produces three}\\ \text{products x, y and z ,which he sells in}\\ \text{two markets. Annual Sales are}\\ \text{indicated below:}\\ \begin{tabular}{cccc} \text{Market} & {} &\text{Products}&{}\\ \hline I & 10,000 &2,000 &18,000 \\ II & 6,000 & 20,000 & 8,000 \\ \end{tabular}\\
\text{If unit sale prices of x, y and z are}\\ \text{Rs 2.50, Rs 1.50 and Rs 1.00,}\\ \text{respectively, find the total revenue in}\\ \text{each market with the help of matrix}\\ \text{algebra.}

step.context: \text{What is the formula used for calculating}\\ \text{total revenue?}

choices.tex: \text{Total Revenue in}\\ \text{Market I : Rs 46,000}\\ \text{Market II : Rs 53,000}\\
\text{Total Revenue in}\\ \text{Market I : Rs 53,000}\\ \text{Market II : Rs 46,000}\\
\text{Total Revenue in}\\ \text{Market I : Rs 50,000}\\ \text{Market II : Rs 53,000}\\
